title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is left blank while adding, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should display the externalized text in the chart, even if the localization key is left blank during the adding process.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Set an externalized text in the chart title. 2. Add a localization key and leave it blank. Check if the externalized text is displayed correctly in the chart.
